verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him out of the tabernacle <S%H4480><s%> <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, If <S%H3588><s%> any man <S%H120><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you bring <S%H7126><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> ye shall bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> your offering <S%H7133><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the cattle, <S%H929><s%> even of <S%H4480><s%> the herd, <S%H1241><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the flock. <S%H6629><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the herd, <S%H1241><s%> let him offer <S%H7126><s%> a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish: <S%H8549><s%> he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> it of his own voluntary will <S%H7522><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And he shall put <S%H5564><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of the burnt offering; <S%H5930><s%> and it shall be accepted <S%H7521><s%> for him to make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> him.

And he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H853><s%> the bullock <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
And he shall flay <S%H6584><s%> <S%H853><s%> the burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and cut <S%H5408><s%> it into his pieces. <S%H5409><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and lay the wood in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H6086><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the fire: <S%H784><s%>

And the priests, <S%H3548><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> shall lay <S%H6186><s%> <S%H853><s%> the parts, <S%H5409><s%> <S%H853><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> and the fat, <S%H6309><s%> in order upon <S%H5921><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

But his inwards <S%H7130><s%> and his legs <S%H3767><s%> shall he wash <S%H7364><s%> in water: <S%H4325><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> to be a burnt sacrifice, <S%H5930><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> be of <S%H4480><s%> the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> namely, of <S%H4480><s%> the sheep, <S%H3775><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the goats, <S%H5795><s%> for a burnt sacrifice; <S%H5930><s%> he shall bring <S%H7126><s%> it a male <S%H2145><s%> without blemish. <S%H8549><s%>

And he shall kill <S%H7819><s%> it on <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H3409><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the priests, <S%H3548><s%> Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons, <S%H1121><s%> shall sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H853><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall cut <S%H5408><s%> it into his pieces, <S%H5409><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> and his fat: <S%H6309><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall lay them in order <S%H6186><s%> <S%H853><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is on <S%H5921><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

But he shall wash <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> with water: <S%H4325><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> it <S%H853><s%> all, <S%H3605><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a burnt sacrifice, <S%H5930><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be of <S%H4480><s%> fowls, <S%H5775><s%> then he shall bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> turtledoves, <S%H8449><s%> or <S%H176><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons. <S%H3123><s%>

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> it unto <S%H413><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and wring off <S%H4454><s%> <S%H853><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall be wrung out <S%H4680><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H7023><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And he shall pluck away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> his crop <S%H4760><s%> with his feathers, <S%H5133><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> it beside <S%H681><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> on the east part, <S%H6924><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of the ashes: <S%H1880><s%>

And he shall cleave <S%H8156><s%> it with the wings <S%H3671><s%> thereof, but shall not <S%H3808><s%> divide it asunder: <S%H914><s%> and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar, <S%H4196><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the fire: <S%H784><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a burnt sacrifice, <S%H5930><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
